name: a subway is a liminal place
name_original: a subway is a liminal place
description:
A short and simple visual novel featuring a strange subway ride with mysterious tunes. Made for the OST Jam Vol. 2.

Music Featured:

"a fun day in th sno" by rainbowmessenger
"You Gotta Blow In It, Dude!" by Lucas Dicus
"FAST SONG" by AMETHYST
"Leaves in the Wind" by David Olofson
"Help" by FLiPLUKA

Made in Ren'py.
Art, writing, and programming by asteribus.

First time doing something like this all on my own, and definitely the first time I've had to work this fast, so there may be a few glitches! Thank you for checking out my game, and I hope you enjoy it! :)
